name: MotivationalQuotes
0:
”Alexa, Ask Motivational Quotes to motivate me.”
”Alexa, Ask Motivational Quotes to give me a quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: motivational quotes
des:
How many times have you been stuck on your phone looking for some motivational quotes to keep you going? Scrolling through images of the same quotes can be daunting and, let's be honest, time-consuming. Well, not anymore. Alexa's new feature can do this for you! From now on she is not only a house appliance designed to make your life a little easier - she's become your friend and will not let you sit on the couch procrastinating! No more excuses for not working out. No more 'I'll do it later's. Whenever you need that extra boost in your life. Just say 'Alexa, Motivate Me' and be presented with so many quotes you'll feel like you can conquer the world. Why not give it a go?



Just say "Motivate me" to get a motivational quote.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
